query: mutation createFinancialDimension($command: CreateFinancialDimensionCommandInput!) {   createFinancialDimension(command: $command) {     ...financialDimension     __typename   } }  fragment financialDimension on FinancialDimension {   reference   code   description   target   dimensionType   createdBy   createdOn   updatedBy   updatedOn   __typename }
